import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../context/userContext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Shop = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const { user } = useContext(UserContext) useEffect(() => { if (!user) navigate('/login') // eslint-disable-next-line }, [user]) return (
setCategoriesOpen(!categoriesOpen)}>

Categories

{categoriesOpen && (
Cloth
Shoes
Watches
Electronics
)}

0

) } export default Shop
